Ladera Vineyards.address: 150 White Cottage Rd S , Angwin , CA 94508-9615
reviewComments: Had a great time touring Ladera with friends. Some cool history along with some delicious wine, and an excellent tour guide!
had a tour. really nice tour guide, Christina. Rally nice grounds. Love their cabs. Howell mnt cab is the best. ordered 2 cases, again nothing more to say
